To know! :

This torrent contains a 100% functional version of the client to Tera Online KOREAN modified to work on private server RUSSIAN http://newteraonline.com/en

installation:

1. Unzip the files to the root of your hard drive (c:) to simply click on first file and the rest TERA.part01.rar decompress with.

2. To start the game using NewTeraLauncher.exe (as administrator if you are on Vista or 7, as a precaution)

2a. Enter your login server and click the big button at the bottom right

2b. A window appears click on the purple button (the left)

2c. Gameguard launches an error message appears, just click \"OK\" to ignore it. The game starts

3. Double-click the server name in the server list on the right

You create a character and enjoy the games!!



Possible problems:

1. The game was not the latest version and can not connect to the server, you must:

1a. Delete the file version.ini in your installation folder games

1b. Disable your firewall / antivirus and run TERA_Invoker.exe, the official client will launch and perform the update

1c. At the end of the update to close the launcher, go to your folder and open the Tera version.ini with notepad (right click open with)

Change the line in CDSIP CDSIP = XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX = 213239204183 (this is the IP address of depriving)

1d. Save and close the notepad and start NewTeraLauncher.exe
